title: Malwana Mansion Case: Basil Rajapaksa & Thirukumar Nadesan acquitted & released
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Minister Basil Rajapaksa & businessman Thirukumar Nadesan were acquitted and released from the case filed over the misappropriation of public funds for the construction of a mansion in Malwana.

Basil Rajapaksa, the first defendant in the case, was given three indictments by the Attorney General for misappropriating state funds to purchase a 16 acre plot of land, and build a mansion along with a swimming pool.
Malwana Mansion Case: Basil Rajapaksa & Thirukumar Nadesan acquitted & released
